sentences.sentence: Due to his intrepidity he may be the last hope of the village.
sentences.translation: 因为由于他的无畏他可能是村幸免的最后一个希望。

sentences.sentence: Mr. Darcy replied with great intrepidity, "Miss Elizabeth Bennet."
sentences.translation: 达西先生鼓起极大的勇气回答道：“伊丽莎白·班纳特小姐。”

sentences.sentence: I threw myself into class discussions, attempting to dazzle him with my intelligence and intrepidity.
sentences.translation: 我全身心投入班级讨论，试图用我的智慧和冒险精神去赢得他的钦佩。
